Elements.Body: Hello Isaac, it’s Amaia. I’m sure you’ve read my email. I’m sorry again for not reaching out to you sooner! The office has been through a disaster of its own since the blackout. Please come to our office today, if you have a chance.
So will you actually be able to tell us anything?
Do you mind if I bring my friends? We all have a lot of questions.

Feel free to bring along anyone you like. But I’m afraid I can’t be too explicit when answering your questions. The Fog is versatile little thing, as I’m sure you’ve figured, and it’s not within my authority to share more than what’s necessary.

Feel free to bring along anyone you like. But I’m afraid I can’t be too explicit when answering your questions. The Fog is versatile little thing, as I’m sure you’ve figured, and it’s not within my authority to share more than what’s necessary.
Not a lot seems to be within your authority.
I understand - I just hope that we can find out more about the Nightmares.
I promise that you and your friends’ patience will be rewarded.
I promise that you and your friends’ patience will be rewarded.
I appreciate it, Amaia. We’ll see you later today.
